basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from INFV A polymerase (PB1))
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.19841738]Influenza A(FluA):inhibition of PA-binding activity and virus replication(IC50=2.84 ±0.48 nM);Influenza A(FluA):inhibition of PA-binding activity and virus replication(IC50=750.4 ±249.6 nM).
